EigenMeat.EigenMaze
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  EigenMeat.EigenMaze.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Drawable, MobileEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Flag, MassEntity, Powerup
public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements MobileEntity, java.lang.Cloneable

Base class for any independent game world object.
